title: Four arrested in Kaduwela over organised crime
content: Kaduwela Police have arrested four suspects connected to organised criminal activities carried out in several areas while two hand grenades have also been taken into custody.The arrested suspects are involved in various crimes committed in Gothatuwa, Maharagama, Kaduwela and Kahathuduwa police areas.The suspects are between the ages of 21 â€“ 43 years while they are residents of Maththegoda.
